description: Specify that stresses are accumulated and stored during cycling. This slows performance by ~15% but allows the current stress state to be queried and used in contact models during force-displacement computations. By default, the ball stresses are not accumulated but are computed when queried.

examples.description: Enable stress accumulation - allows stress queries during contact model calculations (reduces performance by ~15%)
Disable stress accumulation - default behavior, stresses computed on demand when queried
